backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law 252-2021 - 206 Russell Hill Road

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 252-2021 to repeal By-law 335-2020, being a by-law to designate the property at 206 Russell Hill Road (Toronto-St. Paul's, Ward 12) as being of cultural heritage value or interest, and By-law 930-2020, being a by-law to amend By-law 335-2020 to correct the legal description.
